link.title: Free Online Font Converter

div.p: FreeFontConverter.com allows you to quickly convert between many font formats without the hassle of installing any software on your computer.
Our service works on any operating system including Windows, Mac and Linux.
Our font converting service works for all of the common font formats including TrueType (.ttf), OpenType (.oft) and PostScript (.ps).
We can also convert many of the less well known font formats including Suitcase (.suit) and Data Fork (.dfont) fonts.

form.name: fontConvert
form.p: You can convert from pfa, pfb, pt3, sfd, ttf, otf, otb, t42, cef, cff, gsf, ttc, svg, ik, mf, dfont, bin, suit and bdf.
Now you just need to select the format that you want to convert your font to.

div.label: Select a format to convert to:

select.name: outputFormat
select.title: Select a format to convert to
select.option: bin (Mac PostScript (pfb) resource in a Mac binary wrapper)
sym.ttf (TrueType file with a symbol (custom) encoding)
ttf.bin (Mac TrueType resource in a Mac binary wrapper)
dfont (Mac TrueType resource in a dfont file)
otf.dfont (Mac OpenType resource in a dfont file)
